releases.title: Now And Then (12" Picture Disc)
releases.label: Apple Records
releases.description: A special 12" picture disc featuring the final Beatles song 'Now And Then', including the original demo.

releases.title: Hit Me Hard and Soft Sessions
releases.label: Interscope
releases.description: Exclusive session recordings from the 'Hit Me Hard and Soft' era, available on vinyl for the first time.

releases.title: Scary Monsters (Super Deluxe)
releases.label: Parlophone
releases.description: A deluxe expanded edition of Bowie's classic 1980 album, featuring unreleased outtakes and alternative mixes.

releases.title: Mirage Tour '82 (Live)
releases.label: Warner Records
releases.description: A never-before-released live performance capturing Fleetwood Mac at the height of their 'Mirage' tour.

releases.title: GNX Sessions (Alt Mixes)
releases.label: pgLang
releases.description: Alternative mixes and demos from Kendrick Lamar's latest masterpiece.

releases.title: Sound of Silver (Silver Vinyl)
releases.label: DFA Records
releases.description: The definitive pressing of the dance-punk classic, now on appropriate silver vinyl.

releases.title: Born Like This (Instrumentals)
releases.label: Lex Records
releases.description: The complete instrumental versions of MF DOOM's gritty 2009 album.

releases.title: MTV Unplugged (Rehearsal Sessions)
releases.label: Geffen
releases.description: Rare rehearsal recordings from the legendary MTV Unplugged in New York performance.

releases.title: The Bends (Half-Speed Master)
releases.label: XL Recordings
releases.description: An audiophile-grade half-speed master of Radiohead's sophomore album.

releases.title: Songs In The Key of Life (45 RPM)
releases.label: Motown
releases.description: The ultimate listening experience for Stevie Wonder's magnum opus, cut at 45 RPM.

releases.title: Folklore: The Long Pond Sessions
releases.label: Republic
releases.description: The intimate studio sessions of folklore, pressed on grey vinyl.

releases.title: CHROMAKOPIA Instrumentals
releases.label: Columbia
releases.description: Instrumental versions of tracks from the chart-topping album.
